methods.name: <init>
methods.comment:
Constructs a new ParameterImp with an unassigned ordinal.  The ordinal will be
 established by the function definition.

params.name: dataType
params.comment: the fixed-length datatype of the parameter

params.name: comment
params.comment: the comment to store about this parameter.

methods.name: <init>

params.name: dataType
params.comment: the fixed-length datatype of the parameter

params.name: comment
params.comment: the comment to store about this parameter.

params.name: ordinal
params.comment: the index of this parameter within the function signature.

methods.name: validateDataType
methods.comment:
Validate the specified datatype based upon its' use as a parameter or return type.
 Ensure that the datatype has been cloned to the specified datatype manager (dtMgr).

params.name: isReturn
params.comment: true if checking return datatype, false if parameter datatype.

return.comment: datatype suitable for use within the target FunctionDefinition.
